body: So lately I've been having some connection problems on Avicus. I get the "World Downloading" screen for about 5 minutes, and once in the lobby, it takes me another 5 minutes to actually get the game menu. I only get 1 bar, and when playing, people practically teleport around me, making Avicus unbearable. I play on plenty of other servers, but this doesn't happen to me. Any help?
